text: To anes æceres bræde on wealstillinge & to þære wære gebirigeað XVI hida.
Gif ælc hid byþ be anum men gemannod þonne mæg man gesettan ælce gyrde mid feower mannum.
Þon gebyred to twentigan gyrdan on wealstillinge hundeahtatig hida & to þam furlange gebirgeað oþer healf hund hida & X hida be þam ilcan getæle þe ic her bebufan tealde.
To twam furlangum gehyrað XX hida & þreo hund hida to þrim furlangum hundeahtatig hida & CCCC hida þonne gebyrigeað.
To IIII furlangum XL hida & VI hund hida.
To fif furlangum gebyreð ymbganges eahta hund hida on wealstillinge.
To six furlangum gebyreð sixtig hida & nigan hund hida.
To VII furlangum XX hida & XI hund hida.
To eahta furlangum ymbeganges wealstillinge hundeahtatig hida & XII hund hida.
To nigan furlangum XL hida & XIIII hund hida.
To X furlangum gebyreþ XVI hund hida.
To XI furlangum gebyreþ LX hida & XVII hund hida.
To XII furlangum ymbeganges wealstillige gebyreð XX hida & nigantyn hund hida.
Gif se ymbegang mara biþ þon mæg man eaþe þone ofereacan geþencan of þisse tale for þon ealning to anum furlange gebyreð sixtig manna & C þonne biþ ælc gyrd mid feower mannum geset.
